# Getting Started

Welcome to the project. This guide covers the basics.

## Installation

Run the following command to install:

```bash
cargo install mdvdb
```

## Configuration

Create a `.markdownvdb` file in your project root with your settings.

### Required Settings

You must set the embedding provider before first use.

## Usage

After installation, run `mdvdb ingest` to index your markdown files.
